outputs.output_descr: Kyrgyzstan's participation as a member of the three Rio Conventions provides access to resources for improving environmental management that will yield global environmental benefits. The aim of this project is to assist Kyrgyzstan develop and assess its capacity for implementation of these conventions, in order to meet global environmental objectives by improving the capacities to conserve biodiversity, mitigate and adapt to climatic changes, and reduce land degradation.

project_descr: National Capacity Self-Assessment for Global Environment Management in Kyrgyzstan
